high_descs: Turn around and go to the right end of the couch that is across the room from you.
Pick up the orange throw pillow, on the right side of the couch.
Turn back around and go across then turn right and go to the arm chair in the corner.
Place the pillow on top of the newspaper, on the cushion of the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put a throw pillow on the a chair.

high_descs: Circle right around the table until you get to the black couch with an orange pillow on it.
Pick up the orange pillow on the black couch.
Turn left and go to the black chair in the corner.
Put the orange pillow on the black chair.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up the orange pillow and put it on the black chair.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the couch up ahead.
Pick up the pillow on the couch.
Turn left, move forward, then turn left and go toward the door, then turn right to face the chair.
Put the pillow on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put a pillow on the chair.

high_descs: Turn around and take one step, then turn left and walk to the couch.
Pick up the orange pillow that is near the newspaper on the couch.
Turn around and walk across the room, then turn right.
Put the orange pillow down on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: To move the pillow.

high_descs: Turn to the right and face the black couch with the newspaper and pillow on it.
Pick the pillow up from the couch.
Turn around and cross the room and turn to the right to face the black chair with a credit card on it.
Put the pillow on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put a pillow on a chair.

high_descs: Turn to your right and go to the couch across from you.
Pick up the orange pillow on the right end of the couch.
Turn around and walk across the living room to the arm chair on your right.
Place the pillow on the seat of the arm chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put a pillow on one of the chairs.

high_descs: Turn around and head toward the couch with the set of keys on top.
Pick up the set of keys from the couch.
Turn left, head toward the window, and turn right facing the lamp in the corner.
Turn on the lamp
tasks.task_desc: Examine a set of keys by the light of a tall lamp.

high_descs: Turn left and walk forward, hang a left at the coffee table and walk over to the couch.
Pick up the set of keys off of the couch.
Walk over to the tall lamp that is in the corner of the room to the left of the couch in front of you.
Turn on the light of the tall lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Examine a set of keys in the light of a tall lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and face the black couch with the keys on it.
Pick the keys up from the couch.
Turn left and go forward and then right to face the lamp in the corner.
Turn the lamp on.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up keys and turn a lamp on.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the end table between the couch and green chair.
Take the keys from the drawer in the end table.
Turn left and walk to the window, then turn right and look up at the lamp.
Turn the lamp on.
tasks.task_desc: Look at a set of keys under the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the side table by the blue chair.
Take the keys out of the drawer of the side table.
Turn left and walk to the corner where the lamp is.
Turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Look at a set of keys by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the small white end table sitting to the right of the couch
Open the drawer on the end table and pick up the keys then close the drawer
Turn left and cross the room and turn right to face the tall floor lamp
Turn on the lamp
tasks.task_desc: Examine keys under a tall lamp

high_descs: walk straight towards the door then turn left towards the table
pick up the keys off of the table
turn around and walk straight a bit then turn right and walk straight towards the window and turn right towards the lamp
turn the lamp light on
tasks.task_desc: pick up keys and view them in the lamp light

high_descs: walk to face side table to right of couch
pick up keys from couch
walk left to face floor lamp
turn on floor lamp
tasks.task_desc: turn on floor lamp while holding keys

high_descs: Walk to the end of the couch, then turn left and look at the table.
Pick up the keys on the table.
Turn left and walk to the lamp in the right corner of the room.
Turn on the lamp.
tasks.task_desc: Look at a set of keys by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Proceed ahead to couch.
Pick up left set of keys off couch.
Turn left, move to end of couch, turn right to face couch.
Put keys in empty box on couch.
Pick up box with keys off of couch.
Turn around, proceed across room.  Turn right to face chair.
Put box with keys on chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put keys in box, move box to chair.

high_descs: Move across the room to stand in front of the right end of the sofa, which is closest to the lamp.
Pick up the leftmost set of keys from the cushion.
Carry the keys to the other end of the sofa where the open box is.
Place the keys in the box.
Pick up the box with the keys inside from the sofa.
Turn around and cross the room to the door, and then turn right to face the chair in front of the window.
Place the box with the keys inside on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Move a box with keys inside to a chair.

high_descs: Move around the coffee table and move forward to the side of the couch closest to the small white table and turquoise chair.
Pick up the set of keys closest to the cardboard box from the center of the couch.
Turn left and move towards the floor lamp in the corner of the room, then turn right and face the cardboard box on the couch to the right of the plaid cushion.
Place the set of keys in the cardboard box.
Pick up the cardboard box to the right of the plaid cushion from the couch.
Turn around, move towards the gray door to the right of the laptop, then turn right and face the chair in the corner of the room.
Place the cardboard box containing the set of keys on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Place a cardboard box containing a set of keys on a chair.

high_descs: Walk forward to the couch between two lamps
Pick up the left most set of keys
Turn and walk over to the left side of the same couch
Put the keys in the box on the couch
Pick up the box from the couch
Turn around and walk over to the chair near the door
Put the box down on the chair
tasks.task_desc: Put the box of keys on the chair

high_descs: Head towards the right side of the sofa in front.
Pick up the set of keys on the left side on the sofa.
Turn left and go the left side of the sofa.
Place the keys in the empty box on the sofa.
Pick up the box with the keys up from the sofa.
Turn around and head towards the leather chair across the room.
Place the box on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Place the key inside a box to put on the leather chair.

high_descs: Walk to the couch ahead and to the right.
Pick up the leftmost keys.
Take a step to the left.
Put the keys in the box on the couch.
Pick up the box.
Turn around and walk to the black chair in the right corner.
Put the box on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box with keys on it on a chair.

high_descs: Turn right and walk towards the wall, then hang a left ad walk up to the chair.
Pick up the closest set of keys off of the seat of the chair.
Turn left and walk over to the coffee table, then turn right and walk around to the far side of the coffee table.
Put the set of keys in the cardboard box on the coffee table.
Pick up the cardboard box off of the coffee table.
Turn left and walk towards the wall, then turn right and walk up to the chair.
Put the cardboard box with the keys in it on the chair to the right of the credit.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cardboard box with keys in it on the seat of a chair.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the left. stop at the black chair.
Pick up the keys off the couch.
Walk to the left and go around the pallet.
Put the keys inside of the cardboard box.
Pick up the box off of the pallet.
Turn left and walk forward. Make a right at the shelf and go forward to the chair.
Place the cardboard box on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Move a cardboard box with keys inside onto a chair.

high_descs: Turn to the right, go to the wall, turn to the left, go to the chair.
Pick up the set of keys that is closest to you.
Turn to the left, go to the table, turn to the right, go forward and hang a left, go to the couch and hang a left, go forward, turn to the left to face the white table.
Put the keys inside the cardboard box that is on the white table.
Pick up the cardboard box with the keys in it.
Turn to the left, go forward to the shelf and hang a right, go forward to the chair.
Put the cardboard box down in the chair to the right of the remote control and behind the credit card.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cardboard box containing keys in a chair.

high_descs: Walk ahead to the chair.
Pick up the keys closest to you.
Turn left and walk around the table to the opposite side.
Place the keys in the box on the table.
Pick up the box.
Walk forward and to the left to the chair.
Place the box on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box with keys in it on a chair.

high_descs: Turn and walk to the chair near the door
Pick up the keys from the chair furthest from the remote
Turn and walk around to the small white coffee table
Put the keys into the box on the table
Pick up the box from the table
Turn and walk back to the chair
Set the box down on the chair
tasks.task_desc: Put the box with keys on the chair

high_descs: Turn right, go ahead towards the window, then hang left and walk over to the side of the chair.
Pick up the keys that are closest to you off the seat of the chair.
Turn left and walk around to the other side of the table in the middle of the room.
Place the keys in the cardboard box on the table.
Pick up the cardboard box with the keys inside it.
Turn left, walk towards the wall then hang right and return to the chair where you got the keys.
Place the cardboard box with the keys inside it on the seat of the chair to the right of the remote and credit card.
tasks.task_desc: Place a cardboard box with keys inside onto a chair.

high_descs: Turn and go to the left side of the couch.
Pick up the keys that are on the couch.
With the keys in hand turn and face the coffee table.
Place the keys in the box that is on the coffee table.
Pick up the box with the keys in it.
Turn and take the box with the keys to the chair that is to the left of the fireplace.
Place the box on the chair that is next to the fireplace.
tasks.task_desc: Put the keys in a box to put on chair.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the strange white object then turn left and walk to the couch.
Pick up the keys that are on the couch.
Turn right and take a step then turn right and take a step towards the small white table.
Put the keys in the box on the table.
Pick up the box with the keys in it.
Turn left and walk to the tv stand then turn right and walk to the chair.
Put the box on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box with keys in it on the chair.

high_descs: Move forward to the back couch along the wall.
Pick up the keys from the left side of the couch.
Take the keys, and turn around to the coffee table.
Place the keys inside the box.
Pick up the box from the coffee table.
Carry the box and turn to the left and then the right to find a chair in the corner.
Place the box on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Move keys to a box and move both to a chair.

high_descs: Walk over to the dark sofa
Pick up the keys from the sofa
Turn around and approach the small white coffee table
Put the keys into the box on the coffee table
Pick up the box from the table
Walk over to the chair to the left of the fireplace
Put the box on the chair

high_descs: Turn to the right and walk to just before the coffee table then turn left and walk to the sofa
Pick up the keys from the sofa
Turn around and go to the coffee table
Put the keys in the box that is on the coffee table
Pick up the box from the coffee table
Turn to the left and go past the coffee table then turn to the right and go to the black chair
Put the box on the chair

high_descs: Walk ahead to the couch.
Pick the keys up from the table.
Turn around and look at the table.
Place the keys in the box on the table.
Pick up the box.
Walk ahead and to the left to the chair in the corner of the room.
Place the box on the chair.

high_descs: Walk to the table
Pick the keys up from the table
Carry them to the couch
Set them down on the couch cushion

Grab the other set of keys from the table
Carry them to the couch
Set them down on the couch cushion

high_descs: Turn to the left then turn to the right
Walk over to the coffee table
Pick the keys up from the coffee table
Walk over to the couch and set the keys down on the couch cushion
Walk to the end table
Pick the second set of keys up
Walk the over to the couch
Set the second set of keys down on the couch by the first set of keys

high_descs: Turn left, go to the left short side of the coffee table and face the coffee table.
Take the keys from the coffee table.
Turn right, go straight and to the left to the couch.
Put the keys in front of the box on the couch.
Turn right, go straight, turn left towards the side table to the right of the couch, go to the side table.
Take the keys from the side table.
Go back to the couch to the left and face the couch.
Put the keys to the right of the other keys on the couch.

high_descs: Walk around to the side of the table with keys on it in the middle of the room.
pick up the keys on the table.
Walk around the table and then over to face the couch.
Place the keys in front of the box on the couch.
Walk to face the table on the right side of the couch.
pick up the keys on the table.
Walk back to face the couch to the left of the table the keys were on.
place the keys beside the other keys on the couch.

Turn right and walk to the right cushion of that couch.
Place the keys on the couch to the right of the remote.

Pick up the keys on the back, right corner of the arm chair in the corner of the room.
Turn to your right and go to the couch across the room.
Place the keys on the right side of the couch, between the remote and the laptop.
tasks.task_desc: Put the keys on the couch.

high_descs: Walk a few steps, turn left, walk to the door, then turn right to face the brown chair.

Turn to the right and walk up to the couch.
Place the set of keys on the couch, between the remote and laptop.

high_descs: Walk forward to the small white table in front of you.
Pick up the set of keys that are on the table.
Turn around, walk almost to the coffee table, then turn left to face the loveseat.
Place the keys on the left cushion of the loveseat.

Pick the keys up from the table.
Turn around and turn left to face the couch with newspapers on it.
Put the keys down on the left side of the couch.

Turn around and veer left to the closest couch cushion.

pick up the keys from the side table

put the keys on the sofa in front of the box

Put the car keys on the black couch between the box and the laptop.

grab the box off of the couch

high_descs: Walk across the room and then turn to the right to walk to the wall, then turn right and face the table.

Turn the lamp on.

Pick up the tissue box from the table.

Pick up the credit card on the chair.

Turn the lamp on.

remove credit card from middle shelf
walk to face floor lamp
turn on floor lamp

Put the keys next to the computer on the sofa .

Pick up the keys on the table.
Turn around and go to the sofa.
Put the keys next to the computer on the sofa .

high_descs: Turn around and take a step then turn right and walk across the room, turn right at the table be the wall then turn right to face the pallet that's in the middle of the room
Pick up the keys that are laying on the pallet
turn right and walk to the couch then turn left and walk to the end of the couch and then face the couch
Place the keys on the couch on the very right of the laptop

Place the keys on the couch to the right other keys that are already there.
